mapper.insert: MERGE INTO profile_img USING DUAL ON (userNo = #{userNo}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET p_original = #{pOriginal}, p_change = #{pChange}, p_filepath = #{pFilePath}, p_filesize = #{pFileSize}, p_fileupdate = #{pFileUpdate} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (p_file_No, userNo, Biz_no, p_original,p_change, p_filepath, p_filesize,p_fileupdate,p_del_yn) VALUES (PROFILE_IMG_SEQ.nextval,#{userNo},'',#{pOriginal},#{pChange}, #{pFilePath},#{pFileSize},#{pFileUpdate},'N' )
